DataComment.name: Oscar Cafeo
DataComment.comment: This course was well organized and covered a lot more details than any other Figma courses. I really enjoy it. One suggestion is that it can be much better if we could complete the prototype together. Since we created 24 frames, I really want to test it on Figma mirror to see all the connections. Could you please let me take a look at the complete prototype?

DataShop.name: Urban Bags
DataShop.des: Founded in 1985, French label Celio channels 30 years of expertise into its contemporary menswear range. Expect fly style for a city or beach with its denim bag, chinos and printed jersey.

DataShop.name: Collusion t-shirt
DataShop.des: As popular off field as they are on, New Era caps are standard issue amongst those with a passion for street culture, blending progressive styles with carefully crafted design.

DataShop.name: Front Watch
DataShop.des: Founded in 1985, French label Celio channels 30 years of expertise into its contemporary menswear range. Expect fly style for a city or beach with its denim bag, chinos and printed jersey.

DataShop.name: Front original cap
DataShop.des: As well as being game-changers when it comes to technical innovation, Front has some of the bestselling cap in its locker.
